ComicInfo.Title: Dusk
ComicInfo.Summary:
WHAT ARE LITTLE BOYS MADE OF? - Part 5 of 5. Static's intervention in a clash between gay rights activists and the Sons of Odin forces him into personal combat with an old embittered enemy: Hotstreak!
A sick Static faces off against a furious Hotstreak in the middle of a gay rights rally. Static barely puts down Hotstreak and the police disperse the rest of the Sons of Odin. Hotstreak is finally arrested and a sick Virgil goes home. Daisy and her mom get arrested also. Hotstreak escapes the cops and hunts for Static again. Hotstreak causes some wreckage and captures Frieda. Rick ends up shooting Hotstreak.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-21 06:44:43. [CVDB40474]
ComicInfo.Characters: Daisy Watkins, Frieda Goren, Hot-Streak, Jean Hawkins, Rick Stone, Sharon Hawkins, Static
ComicInfo.Teams: 5-Alarm Crew, Bang Babies, Sons of Odin
